statements: SELECT * FROM claim_settlements;
SELECT claim_id, policyholder_name, claim_amount FROM claim_settlements ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) FROM claim_settlements;
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_status = 'Approved';
SELECT policyholder_name, claim_amount FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policyholder_name, settlement_status FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT claim_id, policyholder_name, claim_amount FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_status IN ('Approved', 'Rejected') ORDER BY settlement_status, settlement_date;
SELECT claim_id AS 'Claim ID', policyholder_name AS 'Policyholder Name', settlement_status AS 'Status' FROM claim_settlements ORDER BY policyholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claim_settlements ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim_settlements WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT analysis_id, trend_type, analysis_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type = 'Increase' ORDER BY analysis_date;
SELECT claim_id, trend_type FROM trend_analysis INNER JOIN claim_settlements ON trend_analysis.claim_id = claim_settlements.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements WHERE claim_amount > 5000
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claim_settlements WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim_settlements WHERE claim_date >= '2022-06-01' AND claim_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claim_settlements JOIN trend_analysis ON claim_settlements.claim_id = trend_analysis.claim_id WHERE trend_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY analysis_date
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, trend_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements;
SELECT insured_name, settlement_amount FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, insured_name, settlement_amount FROM claim_settlements ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, settlement_date, claim_status FROM claim_history WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT trend_id, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type = 'medical';
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements ORDER BY settlement_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT insured_name, settlement_amount FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_amount > 5000 ORDER BY settlement_amount ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claim_history WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT trend_type, COUNT(trend_id) AS total_trends FROM trend_analysis GROUP BY trend_type ORDER BY total_trends DESC;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements;
SELECT claim_id, amount FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT settlement_date, settlement_type FROM claim_settlements ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT policy_id, premium FROM policy_details WHERE premium > 5000 ORDER BY premium DESC;
SELECT claim_id, settlement_date, amount, settlement_type FROM claim_settlements WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, settlement_date, amount, settlement_type FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY claim_id ASC;

SELECT claim_id, settlement_date, amount, settlement_type FROM claim_settlements INNER JOIN claim_details ON claim_settlements.claim_id = claim_details.claim_id WHERE claim_details.policy_id = 101 AND claim_settlements.settlement_type = 'Insurance' ORDER BY claim_settlements.amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_description FROM claim_details WHERE DATE_DIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), claim_date) <= 30 ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements;
SELECT claim_id, settlement_amount, settlement_date FROM claim_settlements WHERE claim_status='approved';
SELECT * FROM policy_details ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_type FROM policy_details WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT trend_category, trend_value FROM trends_analysis WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claim_settlements
SELECT claim_id, settlement_date, claim_status FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_amount > 1000
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM policy_details WHERE policy_type = 'Health Insurance'
SELECT forecast_category, forecast_value FROM forecast_data ORDER BY forecast_value DESC
SELECT trend_category, AVG(trend_value) AS average_value FROM trends_analysis GROUP BY trend_category
